definition: to attack/to inherit/classifier for suits (esp. of funeral robes)

sentences.english: America has gone more than seven years without another terrorist attack on our soil.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的7年多來，美國本土再也沒遭受過恐怖襲擊。

sentences.english: Most worrying is a pre-election attack in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 最令人擔心的是美國大選前的恐怖襲擊。

sentences.english: After the twin towers collapsed , fashion week was cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 雙子塔遭受了恐怖襲擊後，時裝週被取消了。

sentences.english: Did you read the article about the terrorist attack?
sentences.chinese: 你刊登了那篇關於恐怖襲擊的文章了嗎？

sentences.english: Of course, nothing will bring back those loved ones that families have lost to terror.
sentences.chinese: 當然，對於恐怖襲擊的受害者家庭來說，逝者已矣。

sentences.english: The state-run railway company said the derailment could have been the result of terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯國有鐵路公司說，這次事故可能是恐怖襲擊。

sentences.english: An honor guard presented a flag that had flown over ground zero after the attacks.
sentences.chinese: 儀仗隊手持恐怖襲擊後飄揚于歸零地上空的國旗。

sentences.english: Mr. Awlaki was wanted by both the United States and Yemen for his reported involvement in terrorist attacks.
sentences.chinese: 由於涉嫌恐怖襲擊，奧拉基被美國和也門通緝。

sentences.english: "We have to accept a terrorist attack can happen anywhere, " said Sivanandan.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須承認，恐怖襲擊可能發生在任何地方。

sentences.english: This will be their first meeting after the terrorist attack in Bombay.
sentences.chinese: 這是在孟買恐怖襲擊事件之後兩人的首次會見。

sentences.english: They did not say which country was the target of the foiled plot.
sentences.chinese: 他們沒有說哪一個國家是這起被挫敗的恐怖襲擊目標。

sentences.english: The characteristic and calamity of the underground space suffered from the nuclear biological or chemical raid are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 論述了地下空間遭受核生化恐怖襲擊時的特點和災害。

sentences.english: Bildt identified nature of the incident a terrorist attack.
sentences.chinese: 比爾特認定事件性質爲恐怖襲擊。

sentences.english: A nuclear terrorist attack is a near inevitability.
The development trend of the international terrorism and the possible terror raid to the underground space are analyzed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 論述了地下空間遭受核生化恐怖襲擊時的特點和災害。

sentences.english: Breivik has been charged with terrorism and will be arraigned on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 佈雷維克被指控犯有恐怖襲擊罪並將於週一提審。

definition: terrorist attack (abbr. for 恐怖襲擊|恐怖袭击[kong3 bu4 xi2 ji1])
to set on fire/to commit arson
to crash (into another car)/(fig.) (of opinions, schedules etc) to clash/(of subject matter) to be the same
to open fire/to shoot a gun
